00045 
00046 void help() {
00047   cout << "engine-runner - Basic program that launches specified program in a seperate process." << endl;
00048   cout << endl;
00049   cout << "usage:" << endl;
00050   cout << "   engine-runner port [engine args]" << endl;
00051   exit(1);
00052 }
00053 
00054 /* Run an engine. */
00055 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00056   if (argc < 2) {
00057     help();
00058   }
00059   vector<string> progArgs;
00060   for (int i = 3; i < argc; i++) {
00061       progArgs.push_back(argv[i]);
00062   }
00063   string s = argv[1];
00064   unsigned int port = Convert::toInt(s);
00065   SocketEngine engine(argv[2], progArgs, "127.0.0.1", port);
00066   engine.run();
00067   return 0;
00068 }
